reviews.review: 这个游戏很值得我去花钱补票，这只是我童年玩的非常快乐的游戏，但是让我度过了无聊的暑假，v社谢谢你
Worth a quick playthrough, but portal 2 is miles better

This game is one of the staples of puzzle-based adventure games of the 21st century. The humor is still on point to this day and the minimalist approach of the game with you and GlaDOS makes it feel that much more claustrophobic. A lot of innovative gameplay that made Valve the company people remember them for.

Probably one of those games that I feel like every gamer should play at least once. Definitely one of the best puzzle games out there with the bonus of a great story/music too.
Portal is a great puzzle game and is quite challenging while having simple mechanics. Sadly, I finished it in one sitting, so keep in mind that the game is pretty short.

Highly original game with a great story and well written funny dialog. A must for every PC gamer, plus the game is only around 2-3 hours to complete, so can be done in a single sitting. Goes on sale for like one pound, well worth it. One of valves best games!
intresting game mecahnic, great SFX, nice story and love the music at the end

Recomendo comprar o bundle com o portal 1 e 2 que sai até mais barato na sale :)

Технодемка із непоганим сюжетом, яку Valve назвали окремою грою.
Перший Портал в цілому хороший, проти не йде в ніяке зрівняння із його прямим продовженням.
Придбання першого Портала є раціональним лише для прямого ознайомлення із загальним сюжетом франшизи для подальшого комфортного проходження Портала 2. У всіх інших випадках не має права на існування.
Розглядається як завершена гра у комплдекті із продовженням 2011 року і без відриву від нього. Валве провернула точно такий самий хід із франшизою Left 4 Dead. Там точно так само перша частина стала абсолютно не життєздатною після виходу другої.
Одним словом, непогано, грати можна, але нащо вона потрібна якщо є Portal 2?
This game made me intelligent after years of thinking i am dumb
One of the best games ever!

Portal review
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Pros:
+First-person game
+Neat idea with portals and portal guns (so i guess it is a first-person shooter)
+The cake is a lie
+End song is great
+Classic
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Cons:
-Short (2.5-4 hours)
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Do I recommend Portal?
Yes
i like how they used the portal gun thing like from splitgate its very cool

[h1]Что тут говорить это портал, культовая игра.[/h1]
Весьма интересная игра. Проходил ее ни один раз, в этот раз прошел на все достижения. Довольно затягивающий своей механикой проект. И естественно не стоит забывать что игра 2007 года. Присутствие русской локализации не может не радовать, хотя озвучка кривовато сделана. Вобщем определенно стоит вашего внимания, хотя и проходится в черепашьем темпе (моем) за 3 часа.

Despite it's age, if you legitimately haven't ever played Portal for some reason or it somehow isn't in your library already, this is 100% a staple for everyone to own and play through.  Like seriously, at this point you should know the premise of the game so I don't need to explain much.  If you haven't played this yet, FIX THAT **** RIGHT NOW.
Just as good as I remember! The challenge modes are pretty tough.

Quem diria que um simples experimento de game design em uma feira de jogos (que logo depois foi aplicado dentro da engine do Half-Life) resultaria em um dos jogos mais icônicos e únicos da história dos videogames. Um clássico atemporal!

O jogo é meio curto, mas dá pra se divertir bastante com esse jogo, ainda mais com a presença de uma das antagonistas mais carismáticas que eu já vi na minha vida: a GLaDOS. É simplesmente fantástico!

Esse é o tipo de jogo que você deve colocar na sua biblioteca o quanto antes, recomendo totalmente!

E quando for jogar, lembre-se: O BOLO É UMA MENTIRA!
played through the story twice now and I love this game, great puzzles, fun dialogue, its terrifying how quiet it is, it feels almost like a horror game at times
woudl play again plaese check it out

good but very short. it took about 2 hours to beat including all the extra achievements you can get on your first play through. this felt more like an extended tech demo than a full game because of how short it is and because it has basically no story. portal 2 is definitely the full experience, but this is also worth playing.

Everybody knows and everybody loves Portal. You can’t really hate this game if you are any type of puzzle fan. The portal mechanic was something completely new when the game came out and it still holds up to this day. The gameplay and puzzle solving is pretty unique and makes you think outside of the box. In addition to that, you also get a humorous story narration along the way.

My main complaint is that the puzzles are too easy and can be solved rather quickly without much thought, there isn’t much satisfaction in completing the game. The game is also very short, it can be completed within 4 hours. To me, Portal seems like more of a proof of concept for its eventual sequel that has way more content. Still though it is fun to play through.
